Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: According to news media: people in Australia are keeping a close watch on the government's moves ahead of the upcoming Federal Budget. The plans from the Treasurer include cost-of-living relief and rebates for energy bills but the opposition is putting pressure on the government to balance spending responsibly for sustainable results. Issues like changes to gas tax and a proposed referendum on a voice to parliament for the Aboriginal community are also causing public debates. Furthermore the Treasurer is pushing for support for changes to the Reserve Bank's operations in efforts to stabilize the economy.
